nl_question: Is 'Dizziness' a reported side effect of any drugs targeting the protein encoded by the gene BRCA1?
List all disorders associated with drugs that have 'Vomiting' as a side effect.
Are 'Dermatitis' and 'Skin rash' considered the same side effect, or are there subtle differences in their clinical presentation?
cypher_translation: MATCH (s1:SideEffect {displayName: 'Dermatitis'})-[:SideEffectSameAsPhenotype]->(s2:SideEffect {displayName: 'Skin rash'}) RETURN s1.displayName AS SideEffect1, s2.displayName AS SideEffect2

nl_question: Which genomic variants are associated with increased risk of experiencing 'Pruritus' as a drug side effect?
Are there any drugs known to cause 'Abdominal pain NOS' in specific tissues or populations?
cypher_translation: MATCH (d:Drug)-[:DrugHasSideEffect]->(s:SideEffect {displayName: 'Abdominal pain NOS'})-[:VariantAssociatedWithDisorder]->(v:GenomicVariant)-[:GeneExpressedInTissue]->(t:Tissue) RETURN d.displayName AS DrugName, t.displayName AS TissueName
